QuestData.Title: Speaking of Bones
QuestData.Description:
The Trial of Valor will be your next test, and test you it will!
But only a fool fights on an empty stomach. Are you a fool, outsider?
No? Then lend these old bones a hand and butcher the moose for our meal. I will spin you a tale of rocks, trees and spirits.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Havi butcher the moose and learn about your next trial.
QuestData.RewardText: A fine cut, I must say. $B$BYes, you will do well against the Bonespeakers, I think.
